Pre-Game Insights: India had an optional training session on Tuesday in the lead-up to the match against Netherlands. The India bowling coach Paras Mhambrey confirmed that no player would be rested for the match and mentioned that Hardik Pandya, who suffered from cramps in the Pakistan match, is fit to play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather forecast for Sydney is better with no prediction of rain interruption during the match.
